mutants.code:
def reverse_list(my_list):
    n = len(my_list)
    left = 1
    right = n - 1
    while left < right:
        (my_list[left], my_list[right]) = (my_list[right], my_list[left])
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    return my_list

def reverse_list(my_list):
    n = len(my_list)
    left = -1
    right = n - 1
    while left < right:
        (my_list[left], my_list[right]) = (my_list[right], my_list[left])
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    return my_list
